programme.title: Knights of Badassdom
programme.desc: Live-action role players conjure up a demon from Hell by mistake and they must deal with the consequences.

programme.title: Cutthroat Island
programme.desc: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island with a fabulous treasure.

programme.title: Three Musketeers
programme.desc: The disbanded Musketeers reunite to defeat a beautiful double agent and the scheming man she is working for.

programme.title: Red 2
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Frank Moses and his team of hapless heroes are tasked with finding a dangerous nuclear weapon

programme.title: Alex Rider: Operation Stormbreaker
programme.desc: A young boy learns of his relative's true occupation as an undercover spy and is later recruited himself.

programme.title: All Is Lost
programme.desc: After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a sailor finds himself staring his mortality in the face.

programme.title: USS Indianapolis: Men of Courage
programme.desc: The harrowing tale of American heroes shipwrecked in shark-infested waters in the waning days of WWII.
A British solider is accidentally abandoned. Alone, he must survive the night within enemy lines.

programme.title: The Hurt Locker
programme.desc: Jeremy Renner portrays the leader of a bomb-defusing squad in Iraq. Winner of six Academy Awards.

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: The true story of conscientious objector Desmond Doss who saved 75 men in WWII without firing a gun.
